full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/1/2023 30. Are you entitled to return to country of issuance of your passport Yes No Travel document Yes No Or other document Yes No (If not, explain why) My GRANdsoN HAS BeeN POLiTiCALLY INVOLVE wiTH THE CONTRAS ANd Him ANd ALL MEMBER OF OUR FAMILIES ARE PERSECUTED BY THE SANDINISTAS GOUERMENT FOIA (b)(6) 31. What do you think would happen to you if you returned? (Explain) THEY WILL KILL ME OR POTME IN JAIL 32. When you left your home country, to what country did you intend to go? To U.S.A 33. Would you return to your home country? Yes No (Explain) My LiFE will be IN DANGER ANd I doNt have FREEDOM THERE. 34. Have you or any member of your immediate family ever belonged to any organization in your home country? Yes No. (If yes, provide the following information relating to each organization: Name of organization, dates of membership or affiliation, purpose of the organization, what, if any, were your official duties or responsibilities. and are you still an active member. (If not, Mv GRANd SON FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) 35. Have you taken any action that you believe will result in persecution in your home country? Yes No (If yes, explain) BE AGAINST THE COMMUNiST REGIME OF THE SANDINISTAS GOVERMENT. 36. Have you ever been detained interrogated convicted and sentenced imprisoned in any country? Yes No (If yes, specify for each instance: what occurred and the circumstances, dates, location, duration of the detention or imprisonment, reason for the detention or conviction, what formal charges were placed against you, reason for the release, names and addresses of persons who could verify these statements. Attach documents referring to these incidents, if any). 37. If you base your claim for asylum on current conditions in your country, do these conditions affect your freedom more than the rest of that country's population? Yes No (If yes, explain) BECAUSE MEMBERS OF MY FAMILY HAVE BEEN WORKIN FOR MANY YEARS TO DERROCATE THE COMMUNiST REGIME OF THE SANDINISTAS IN power of NICARAGUA. 38. Have you, or any member of your immediate family, ever been mistreated by the authorities of your home country/country of nationality Yes No. If yes, was it mistreatment because of Race Religion Nationality Political opinion or Membership of a particular social group? Specify for each instance; what occurred and the circumstances, date, exact location, who took such action against you and what was his/her position in the government, reason why the incident occurred, names and addresses of people who witnessed these actions and who could verify these statements. Attach documents referring to these incidents. My SON ROGER ROCHA WAS DETAINED ANd putted IN JAIL BECAUSE OF THE ACTIVITIES OF FUR MY GRANDSON 39. After leaving your home country, have you traveled through (other than in transit) or resided in any other country before entering the U.S.? Yes No (If yes, identify each country. length of stay. purpose of stay. address, and reason for leaving, and whether you are entitled to return to that country for residence purposes. 40. Why did you continue traveling to the U.S.? N/A 41. Did you apply for asylum in any other country? Yes-Give details No -Explain why not BECAUSE I HAD FAMILY HERE AND NOW it is the oNly PLACE WHERE WE CAN BE SAFE. (3) (over)
